scripts.deploy:local: yarn clean && yarn build && oz create Counter --skip-compile -n development --init
scripts.upgrade:local: yarn build && oz upgrade Counter --skip-compile -n development --init
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn clean && yarn build && oz create Counter --skip-compile -n goerli --init
scripts.upgrade:goerli: yarn build && oz upgrade Counter --skip-compile -n goerli --init
scripts.clean: rm -rf cache && rm -rf build && rm -f .openzeppelin/.session && rm -f .openzeppelin/dev-*.json
